isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS - REMOVE

step1.para: Detach driver's seat by removing four mounting bolts which secure seat pedestal to floor. If seat is air suspension type, be sure to disconnect air line before lifting out seat assembly.
Detach passenger seat by removing the four mounting bolts which secure seat frame.

note.para: Clean seat suspension and adjusters as required by wiping away any grease or dirt with shop towel. Apply a light coat of multi-purpose lube to pivot points, sliding areas and rollers to assure a smooth operation on re-installation. Wipe away excess lube.
